  • Method Details

    • modifyAppointmentButtonPressed

      public void modifyAppointmentButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      This method sends the user to the 'Modify Appointment' screen in order to update/modify an existing appointment. It pre-populates the screen with the appointment information and calls upon the 'Modify Appointment Controller' to proceed with the modification.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • searchForAppointmentByDate

      public void searchForAppointmentByDate(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This is the initlialize method for the 'Appointments Main Controller'. It pre-populates each of the columns in the 'Appointments Main Controller'. It then establishes a connection with the mySQL database and then uses the AppointmentsDAO and AppointmentsDAOImpl methods to retrieve all appointments.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -
